SEO_DESCRIPTION: Explore a world of creativity and innovation through my diverse portfolio. From stunning visual designs to cutting-edge web development, witness the seamless blend of art and technology. Elevate your digital presence with my expertise and let your ideas come to life. Discover the perfect fusion of passion and skill in my portfolio - where every project tells a unique story.

PERSONAL_INFO.PARAGRAPH: Greetings from San Miguel, El Salvador!, I'm a web developer navigating the dizzying world of technology, with a special focus on clever solutions in JavaScript using Node.js. Eager to learn and motivated by innovation, I design digital experiences that blend functionality with elegance, like an expert chef mixing the perfect ingredients for a technological feast!

PROJECTS.TITLE: Money Minder, a FullStack Resource Management Solution
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Personal project with Angular and Tailwind. Intuitive user interface with Angular and Typescript for efficient resource allocation, tracking and reporting. It uses technologies offered by Angular, plus a SQLite database on the Edge with Turso for efficient management from the API.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Money Minder API
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Rest API for Money Minder using Express.JS and SQLite. It provides endpoints for managing resources, categories, and transactions, enabling seamless integration with the Money Minder frontend.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Pokémon Explorer: Async API Consumption and Dynamic Filtering
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Fetches data from API using async/await, with customizable retrieval and a sleek progress bar. Filter Pokémon by type or name for a user-friendly exploration experience.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Astro TypeScript Prettier ESLint Configurator
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: A Node.js package for setting up a comprehensive development environment for Astro projects with TypeScript, Prettier, and ESLint. It simplifies the setup process by automating the installation of necessary dependencies and configuration files.

PROJECTS.TITLE: PHP CRUD with Administrative Roles and Secure Sessions
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Integrated database, robust administrative roles, and secure sessions. Allows administrators to print user profiles with role-dependent permissions, enhancing personnel management.

JOBS.TITLE: Virtual Customer Assistant at Peter G
JOBS.DESCRIPTION: Provided customer support and assistance in a virtual setting. Responsibilities included responding to inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring a positive customer experience.

JOBS.TITLE: Freelancer, clinic
JOBS.DESCRIPTION: Worked as a freelance developer for a clinic for 4 months. Improved their old PHP-based system across both frontend and backend, fixing issues, optimizing performance, and updating key features to make the platform more reliable and easier to user.

JOBS.TITLE: Sales advisor at Par2
JOBS.DESCRIPTION: Engaged in customer-centric roles at a prominent shoe store. Primarily focused on delivering exceptional service, handling inquiries, and facilitating sales.

JOBS.TITLE: Sales advisor at Texaco Gas Station
JOBS.DESCRIPTION: Managed transactions and provided customer service at a bustling gas station. Responsibilities included fuel dispensing, payment processing, and ensuring a positive customer experience.

ABOUT_ME.LABEL: About me
ABOUT_ME.PARAGRAPH_1: I'm Rosendo, a web developer from San Miguel, El Salvador. I specialize in JavaScript backend development and enjoy building functional, clean, and reliable solutions.
ABOUT_ME.PARAGRAPH_2: I earned an Associate Degree in Software Development Engineering at ITCA Fepade San Miguel. Beyond that, I expanded my skills independently through GitHub and YouTube tutorials—especially Midudev—learning JavaScript fundamentals and building REST APIs with Express.
ABOUT_ME.PARAGRAPH_3: I’ve worked on multiple real-world and personal projects using technologies like Angular, PHP, Nest, and Tailwind. These projects have strengthened my practical understanding of web development and helped me build reliable, user-focused solutions.
